DOC.brief_summary: PTSD affects a wide variety of symptoms, some of which have been shown to disrupt family relationships. This study will examine some of the effects on parenting, from the perspective of the parent with PTSD.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Post Traumatic Stress Disorder on Parenting
DOC.criteria: ptsd (PSS>15) children under age 18 non ptsd (pss<15) children under age 18
